[[File:Caravanner_Portrait.png|255px|thumb|right|Sothur The Ancient's in-game portrait]]Sothur The Ancient is a [[Trader]] and Mysterious Caravanner.

He is the second Trader you can unlock by leveling, at [[Level]] 6. Sothur The Ancient can't come to your settlement before you hit 33 City score.
